1:
[[ -f "/opt/bitnami/scripts/git/entrypoint.sh" ]] && source "/opt/bitnami/scripts/git/entrypoint.sh"
cd /app && git config --global --add safe.directory $(pwd)
while true; do
    cd /app && git pull origin main
    sleep 60
done
curl --fail localhost:8787/api/v1/system/status?apiKey=`IFS=\> && while read -d \< E C; do if [[ $E = "ApiKey" ]]; then echo $C; fi; done < /config/config.xml`

0:
server:
  enable:
    debug:
      server: true
  listen:
    address: 'http://0.0.0.0:8000'
service:
  alertmanager:
    address: http://alertmanager.monitoring.svc.cluster.local:9093
  kubernetes:
    address: ''
    inCluster: true
    tls:
      caFile: ''
      crtFile: ''
      keyFile: ''
